actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that the first $5,000 of the income of a retired teacher shall be exempt from income tax.

summary.text: Provides, under the Internal Revenue Code, that in the case of a retired teacher, gross income does not include so much of the income received during the taxable year, and otherwise includible in gross income, as does not exceed $5,000.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that the first $5,000 of the income of a retired teacher shall be exempt from income tax.
